```{r tansform_the_data, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
Raw_data$Op_start <- ifelse(nchar(Raw_data$Anaesthesia_Start) == 4, Raw_data$Operation_Start, Raw_data$Anaesthesia_Start)
Raw_data$Op_start <- paste(Raw_data$Event_Date, Raw_data$Op_start, sep = " ")
Raw_data$Op_start <- dmy_hms(Raw_data$Op_start)
Raw_data$Op_start_min <- convertTime(Raw_data$Op_start)

Raw_data$Op_end <- ifelse(nchar(Raw_data$Recovery_Takeover) == 4, Raw_data$Operation_End, Raw_data$Recovery_Takeover)
Raw_data$Op_end <- paste(Raw_data$Event_Date, Raw_data$Op_end, sep = " ")
Raw_data$Op_end <- dmy_hms(Raw_data$Op_end)
Raw_data$Op_end_min <- convertTime(Raw_data$Op_end)

Raw_data$Op_duration <-  Raw_data$Op_end_min - Raw_data$Op_start_min

Raw_data$Event_Date <- dmy(Raw_data$Event_Date)

Raw_data <- Raw_data %>% 
  mutate(Month = month(Event_Date), 
         DOW = wday(Event_Date), 
         Week = week(Event_Date), 
         Day_date = yday(Event_Date))

```

#Introduction {.sidebar}
Data dashboard for the MDHB theatre optimisaition project.

#Waterfall

##Layout {.tabset .tabset-fade}

###Assumptions

1. This is an analysis of the OTIS data set, as collected by the theatre team and supplied by DQHI.
2. The data set was distributed to all parties, so all have the same data set.
3. The study period was the last financial year.
4. The beginning and end times for theatre sessions were as agreed.
5. Audit afternoons were Friday afternoons with more than 3 three theatres having missing data.

###Limitations

1. Data collection issues within theatre.
2. Data entry issues.
3. The underlying data set is therefore technically a chaotic and messy data set.
4. The model parameters have been vigorously debated;
+ parameters are unique to the waterfall chart
+ have been decided on a causing the least distortion basis.
+ so there are positive & negative distortions for individual sessions.

###Chart

###Suite
```{r whole_theatre, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
ot_count <- array(1:366, dim = c(366,1440))
  for (i in 1:366) {
    for (j in 1:1440) {
      ot_count[[i,j]] <- 0
    }
  }

for  (k in 1:7) {
 graphTheatre <- filter(Otis, Theatre == k)
 graphTheatre <- graphTheatre %>% 
   filter(!is.na(Op_start_min) & !is.na(Op_end_min))
 x <- graphTheatre$Op_start_min
 y <- graphTheatre$Op_end_min
 z <- graphTheatre$Day_date
 loop <- nrow(graphTheatre)
 x <- as.list(x)
 y <- as.list(y)
 z <- as.list(z)

 for (i in 1:loop) {
   day <- z[[i]]
   start <- x[[i]]
   if (start == 0) start = 1
   end <- y[[i]]
   if (end == 0) end = 1
   for (j in start:end) {
     ot_count[[day,j]] <- ot_count[[day,j]] + 1
   }
 }
}


time_stamp <- array(1:2, dim = c(1440,2))

for (j in 1:1440) {
  time_stamp[[j,1]] <- j
  time_stamp[[j,2]] <- 0
}

for (j in 495:735) {
  time_stamp[[j,2]] <- 7
}

for (j in 810:1050) {
  time_stamp[[j,2]] <-  7
}

time_stamp <- as.tibble(time_stamp)

time_stamp <- time_stamp %>% 
  select(V2) %>% 
  rename(time_stamp = V2)

mean_pat <-  apply(ot_count,2, mean)
mean_pat <-  as.tibble(mean_pat)
mean_pat <- rename(mean_pat, Average = value)
quantile_pat <- apply(ot_count,2, quantile, 0.85)
quantile_pat <- as.tibble(quantile_pat)
quantile_pat <- rename(quantile_pat, percentile_85 = value)

graph_data <- as.tibble(1:1440)
graph_data <- rename(graph_data, Time = value)

graph_data <- bind_cols(graph_data, mean_pat)
graph_data <- bind_cols(graph_data, quantile_pat)

graph_data <- graph_data %>% 
  mutate(Time = Time / 60, Average = Average, percentile_85 = percentile_85)

graph_data <- bind_cols(graph_data, time_stamp)

ggplot(data = graph_data) +
  geom_col(aes(x = Time, y = Average, colour = "red")) +
  geom_line(aes(x= Time, y = percentile_85, colour = "blue")) +
  geom_line(aes(x= Time, y = time_stamp, colour = "green")) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0,8,1)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,24,2)) +
  ggtitle("               Theatre usage 2016 / min (including Theatre 4)") +
  labs(x = "Time (hrs)", y = "Average number of patients / min of theatre") +
  scale_color_manual(name = "Legend", guide = guide_legend(override.aes=aes(fill = "white")), values = c("green" = "green", "blue" = "blue", "red" = "red"), labels = c("Top 15% lists", "Max # pats/min", "Avg # pats/min")) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 7)) +
  theme_economist()
```

```{r ot5_whole, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
   for (j in start:end) {
     ot_count[[day,j]] <- ot_count[[day,j]] + 1
   }
 }


time_stamp <- array(1:2, dim = c(1440,2))

for (j in 1:1440) {
  time_stamp[[j,1]] <- j
  time_stamp[[j,2]] <- 0
}

for (j in 495:735) {
  time_stamp[[j,2]] <- 1
}

for (j in 810:1050) {
  time_stamp[[j,2]] <-  1
}

time_stamp <- as.tibble(time_stamp)

time_stamp <- time_stamp %>% 
  select(V2) %>% 
  rename(time_stamp = V2)

mean_pat <-  apply(ot_count,2, mean)
mean_pat <-  as.tibble(mean_pat)
mean_pat <- rename(mean_pat, Average = value)
quantile_pat <- apply(ot_count,2, quantile, 0.85)
quantile_pat <- as.tibble(quantile_pat)
quantile_pat <- rename(quantile_pat, percentile_85 = value)

graph_data <- as.tibble(1:1440)
graph_data <- rename(graph_data, Time = value)

graph_data <- bind_cols(graph_data, mean_pat)
graph_data <- bind_cols(graph_data, quantile_pat)

graph_data <- graph_data %>% 
  mutate(Time = Time / 60, Average = Average, percentile_85 = percentile_85)

graph_data <- bind_cols(graph_data, time_stamp)

ggplot(data = graph_data) +
  geom_col(aes(x = Time, y = Average, colour = "red")) +
  geom_line(aes(x= Time, y = percentile_85, colour = "blue")) +
  geom_line(aes(x= Time, y = time_stamp, colour = "green")) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0,1,0.2)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,24,2)) +
  ggtitle("               Theatre 5 usage 2016 / min ") +
  labs(x = "Time (hrs)", y = "Average number of patients / min of theatre") +
  scale_color_manual(name = "Legend", guide = guide_legend(override.aes=aes(fill = "white")), values = c("green" = "green", "blue" = "blue", "red" = "red"), labels = c("Top 15% lists", "Max # pats/min", "Avg # pats/min")) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 7)) +
  theme_economist()
```

#Gap

##layout{.tabset .tabset-fade}

###OT 1
```{r gap_1, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
gap_list1 <- Otis %>% 
  filter(Theatre == "1") %>% 
  select(Event_Date, Op_start_min, Op_end_min) %>% 
  mutate(Gap_1 = 0) %>% 
  mutate(Duration_case_1 = 0) %>%
  arrange(Event_Date)

gap_list1 <- gap_list1 %>% 
  filter(Op_end_min > Op_start_min)

row_count <-  nrow(gap_list1) - 1

for (i in 1:row_count) {
  gap_list1[[i,4]] <- gap_list1[[i + 1,2]] - gap_list1[[i,3]]
}

for (i in 1:row_count) {
  if (gap_list1[[i, 4]] < 0) gap_list1[[i,4]] <-  NA
}

for (i in 1:row_count) {
  if (gap_list1[[i + 1, 2]] > 780 & gap_list1[[i,3]] < 780) gap_list1[[i,4]] <-  NA
}

gap_list1[[row_count + 1,4]] <- NA

ggplot(data = gap_list1, aes(x = Gap_1)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "blue", binwidth = 5) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,300,25)) +
  labs(title = "Histogram of gaps between cases", x = "Minutes") +
  theme_economist()

ggplot(data = gap_list1, aes(x = Gap_1)) +
  stat_ecdf(geom = "step", colour = "blue") +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0,2,0.2)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,300,25)) +
  labs(title = "Cumulative frequency of gaps between cases", x = "Minutes") +
  theme_economist()
```

#Ortho

##Layout {.tabset .tabset-fade}

###CaseCount
```{r ortho_case_count, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
Ortho_list <- Otis %>% 
  filter(SpecialtyCode == "Orthopaedic") %>% 
  filter(DOW != 1 & DOW !=7) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Op_start_min) & !is.na(Op_end_min))

Ortho_list <- Ortho_list %>% 
  filter(Op_duration > 0)
```

In FY16 there was `r nrow(Ortho_list)` orthopaedic operations performed (including both acute & elective) where;

1. In the specialiality of Orthopaedic surgery
2. Between Monday and Friday
3. Where a recorded anaesthetic starting time was in the morning or afternoon list times
4. And a operation end time was entered into OTIS.

The summary of the overall weekday procedure duration is;

```{r ortho_case_count_2, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
summary(Ortho_list$Op_duration)
```

While the summary for all acute procedures is;

```{r ortho_case_count_acyte, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
Ortho_acute <- Otis %>% 
  filter(SpecialtyCode == "Orthopaedic") %>% 
  filter(Modified == "AC") %>% 
  filter(!is.na(Op_start_min) & !is.na(Op_end_min))

Ortho_acute <- Ortho_acute %>% 
  filter(Op_duration > 0)

summary(Ortho_acute$Op_duration)

```

```{r ortho_theatreView, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
mean_pat <-  as.tibble(mean_pat)
mean_pat <- rename(mean_pat, Average = value)
quantile_pat <- apply(ot_count,2, quantile, 0.85)
quantile_pat <- as.tibble(quantile_pat)
quantile_pat <- rename(quantile_pat, percentile_85 = value)
median_pat <-  apply(ot_count,2, median)
median_pat <-  as.tibble(median_pat)
median_pat <- rename(median_pat, Median = value)


graph_data <- as.tibble(1:1440)
graph_data <- rename(graph_data, Time = value)

graph_data <- bind_cols(graph_data, mean_pat)
graph_data <- bind_cols(graph_data, quantile_pat)

graph_data <- graph_data %>% 
  mutate(Time = Time / 60, Average = Average, percentile_85 = percentile_85)

graph_data <- bind_cols(graph_data, time_stamp)

ggplot(data = graph_data) +
  geom_col(aes(x = Time, y = Average, colour = "red")) +
  geom_line(aes(x = Time, y = percentile_85, colour = "blue")) +
  geom_line(aes(x = Time, y = time_stamp, colour = "green")) +
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = seq(0,2,0.2)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(0,24,2)) +
  ggtitle("Theatre usage by Orthopaedic cases in FY16-17 / min") +
  labs(x = "Time (hrs)", y = "Average number of patients / min of theatre") +
  scale_color_manual(name = "Legend", guide = guide_legend(override.aes = aes(fill = "white")), values = c("green" = "green", "blue" = "blue", "red" = "red"), labels = c("85th percentile", "Max # pats/min", "Avg # pats/min")) +
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 7)) +
  theme_economist()
```

###AC vs WL
```{r ortho_breakdown, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
Ortho_type <- Otis %>% 
  filter(SpecialtyCode == "Orthopaedic") %>% 
  filter(Modified == "AC" | Modified == "WL" | Modified == "AA")

Ortho_load <- Ortho_type %>% 
  group_by(Adjusted_week, Modified) %>% 
  summarize(Count = n()) %>%
  ungroup()

Ortho_load$Adjusted_week <- as.integer(Ortho_load$Adjusted_week)

Ortho_load <- Ortho_load %>% 
  filter(Count != 4 & Adjusted_week != 53) %>% 
  spread(Modified, Count)

ggplot(data = Ortho_load) +
  geom_line(aes(x = Adjusted_week, y = AC, colour = "blue")) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x = Adjusted_week, y = AC, colour = "blue"), se = FALSE) +
  geom_line(aes(x = Adjusted_week, y = WL, colour = "green")) +
  geom_smooth(aes(x = Adjusted_week, y = WL, colour = "green"), se = FALSE) +
  labs(title = "Orthopaedic cases FY16-17", x = "Weeks", y = "Number of cases / week") +
  scale_color_manual(name = "Legend", guide = guide_legend(override.aes=aes(fill = "white")), values = c("green" = "green", "blue" = "blue"), labels = c("Acutes", "Electives"))+
  theme(legend.text = element_text(size = 7)) +
  theme_economist()
```

###Forecast
```{r Ortho_acute_demand, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
Ortho_acute <- Otis %>% 
  filter(SpecialtyCode == "Orthopaedic" & Modified == "AC")

Ortho_acute <- Ortho_acute %>% 
  group_by(Adjusted_week) %>% 
  summarise(Count = n()) %>% 
  ungroup

Ortho_acute <- Ortho_acute %>% 
  rename(Week = Adjusted_week)

Ortho_ts <- ts(Ortho_acute$Count)
Ortho_fc <- forecast(Ortho_ts, h = 12,level = c(65,95))
autoplot(Ortho_fc, showgap = FALSE) +
  labs(title = "Prediction of acute orthopaedic theatre demand", subtitle = "during the first 12 weeks of FY17-18", x = "Weeks", y = "Number acute cases / week") +
  theme_economist()

```
